summary: This is a brief email from August 15, 2019, forwarding an 'extension cord memo' related to inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The email indicates the memo was originally sent to 'A' and 'the Lieutenants' and is being forwarded confidentially.

events.title: Forwarding of Extension Cord Memo
events.description: An email is sent forwarding an 'extension cord memo' that was originally sent to 'A' and the Lieutenants concerning inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The document is a confidential email dated August 15, 2019, concerning inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
The email's subject and content reference an 'extension cord memo' specifically for Epstein.
The memo was originally sent to an individual referred to as 'A' and to 'the Lieutenants' before being forwarded.
The document is marked 'CONFIDENTIAL' and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
